gander noun
(LOOK)
have/take a gander informal old-fashioned
to have a quick look: have/take a gander at Let's take a gander at your new car, then.

gander noun
(LOOK)
[ U ] infml a quick look: I heard she had a new car, so I went out to take a gander at it.
